mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.loan_bill_no AS "loanBillNo", a.phone AS "phone", a.status AS "status", a.measure AS "measure", a.remind_date AS "remindDate", a.is_remind AS "isRemind", a.promise_date AS "promiseDate", a.promise_amt AS "promiseAmt", a.odv AS "odv", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.odv_group AS "odvGroup", a.phone_status as "phoneStatus", a.recording as "recording", a.source as "source", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wsxd_remind_record( id, loan_bill_no, phone, status, measure, remind_date, is_remind, promise_date, promise_amt, odv, create_time, odv_group, phone_status, recording, source, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loanBillNo}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{measure}, #{remindDate}, #{isRemind}, #{promiseDate}, #{promiseAmt}, #{odv}, #{createTime}, #{odvGroup}, #{phoneStatus}, #{recording}, #{source}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wsxd_remind_record SET loan_bill_no = #{loanBillNo}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, measure = #{measure}, remind_date = #{remindDate}, is_remind = #{isRemind}, promise_date = #{promiseDate}, promise_amt = #{promiseAmt}, odv = #{odv}, create_time = #{createTime}, odv_group = #{odvGroup}, phone_status = #{phoneStatus}, recording = #{recording}, source = #{source}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
